headline: Jim Cramer on Darden: “I Bet This One is a Winner”
summary: Darden Restaurants, Inc. (NYSE:DRI) is one of the 12 stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar recently. headline: Darden Raises Sales Outlook, Unveils $1B Buyback After Strong Olive Garden Momentum
summary: Darden Restaurants, Inc. (NYSE:DRI) ranks among the best consumer discretionary stocks to buy now. Following solid quarterly results on June 20, Darden Restaurants, Inc. (NYSE:DRI) projects annual same-store sales above expectations, relying on demand from food delivery and marketing initiatives at its casual dining brands like Olive Garden. Darden (NYSE:DRI) anticipates a 2% to 3.5% […]

headline: Bahama Breeze closing: See the list of shuttered locations as Olive Garden parent Darden Restaurants mulls sale
summary: The Caribbean-inspired chain is no longer a “strategic priority” for its parent company, which is now exploring a potential sale. Here’s what to know.
